metadata.name: It's a cross... In Caravaggio style.
metadata.description:
More than a year has passed from the desire to make this shoot to the realization of the idea. 
It was not easy to fight for shooting in the style of a brilliant artist. I admire Caravaggio's painting, as a true genius he was far ahead of his time. 
I immediately decided that the light would be one of the actors of the shooting. Therefore, it was important for me to find a location with good natural light, and to place accents with additional light sources.
The classic plot requires no explanation. 
Special thanks to the models and my entire team, without which I would not have coped.
